form.help: The contact form fields marked with an asterisk are mandatory. The required fields are: name, email, subject, message, data processing and reCaptcha.

name.label: Name
info: The name can only contain letters, spaces, dashes and apostrophes. The name must contain at least 5 and a maximum of 60 characters.

email.label: E-mail
info: The proper e-mail format examples: name@surname.com or name.surname@company.com.

subject.label: Subject
info: The subject can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and characters ,.)-:(!?'. The subject must contain at least 5 and a maximum of 500 characters.

message.label: Message
info: The message can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and characters ,.)-:(!?'. The message must contain at least 5 and a maximum of 2000 characters.

errors.pattern: Validation against robots was unsuccessful. Please try again.

rodo.label: I've read <1>the information about data processing</1>
info: I agree to the processing of personal data in accordance with the law on the protection of personal data in connection with sending a message via the contact form.
Providing this data is voluntary, but necessary to process the query. The data entered in the contact form won't be save in any database and will be processed only to respond to the message.
The personal data administrator is Aleksander Fret.

form.success: Thank you for sending me a message.
form.failed: The message couldn't be sent. Please try again.
